oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Minter Jones Somerville
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Minter Jones Somerville served as a Red Cross volunteer throughout World War I. Her husband, Dr. William G. Somerville served as a doctor and psychiatrist with the A.E.F. The photograph was taken in the garden at her home in Memphis, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Somerville, Minter Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:instructionalMethod: 5.44; US.30; Women in World War I; World War I
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
